## üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Some curiosities about me

Hi, I am Gabriel Monteiro de Souza, currently, I am a Information System Student at [University of S√£o Paulo (USP)](https://www5.usp.br/) | [EACH](https://www5.each.usp.br/), there, I am having the opportunity to improve even more my programming theory with high relevance teachers, developing at scientific researches, trying to make a network infrastructure made of old equipments, as well as, participating in entities that help me to improve my soft skills.

I ‚ù§ Open Source. I love [Linux](https://www.kernel.org/).

I use [Arch](https://archlinux.org/) btw.

- ‚ù§ Yes, I REALLY enjoy Linux, if I could, I probably waste my full time playing around with it
- üéØ My currently goal is to enjoy the university as much as I can
